Quote: “Coffee could just be a delivery system for the words from on high; coffee did come from the Middle East, originally, after all.”
Author: A.D. Aliwat

Quote: “No one is real. Everyone on Earth is pretending. Even we are not true to ourselves, when no one is around. We all are wearing mask so that we can hide our face...”
Author: Anshu David Kiro

Quote: “Following the herd may have been the path of least resistance in the past - but you weren’t born to do that. When the herd isn’t heading in the direction of the world you want to see, you mustn’t be afraid to go against it, because future generations will rely on your courage and vision.”
Author: Simona Ondrejkova

Quote: “No-one wins by looking back at the hills they've already climbed.”
Author: Elliot Connor

Quote: “Powerlessness is simply a lack of meaningful choice.”
Author: Elliot Connor

Quote: “The journey through the preschool years helps children to move from dependence to interdependence to independence.”
Author: Deepa Bhushan

Quote: “A woman of peace will always endorse peace wherever she goes because she understands the true value of peace.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “A woman of vision comprehends that current circumstances do not reflect what her future holds. In her eyes, she sees continuance. In her mind, she thinks influence, and in her heart, she longs for affluence.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “A woman of vision enables great things to happen by pursuing the right things.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “A woman of vision looks at things from a different viewpoint because she does not rely on her eyesight to visualize great things.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “A woman of virtue is not a weakling. Yes, she knows her weaknesses, yet she won’t let them define her. She makes a difference in the world.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “She does not have an issue about a non-issue, because she is a woman of virtue.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “Coffee: just as good as religious fervor, the mild stimulant effects of watered-down wine, anything else used to bring pen to page.”
Author: A.D. Aliwat

Quote: “A woman of substance can never undervalue her existence.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “A woman of a substance tells the blunt truth because she knows she must shine bright. Hence, she does not thrive on lies.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “A wise woman knows her place and uses her faith to go places.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “A wise woman knows that she does not have to fight every battle. For other battles, she just watches until she overcomes.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “More can be achieved in this world if good women are empowered to do what they are good at.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “This world can be a better place if good women are given the space to do good.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “A woman who knows where she stands will remain standing; even when everything around her is crumbling.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “Nothing can bring down a woman comfortable in her skin. She is genuine and never pretends to be who she is not. She knows her worth and what she wants.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “She takes advantage of opportunities to help others. Yet, she takes advantage of no one because she is a selfless woman.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “Womanhood should be celebrated. Being a woman must not be seen as a weakness.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “A powerful woman does not merely rely on the power of a man but the powerful hand of God.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “That was the scary thing about love. It was unpredictable and unfathomable, and when you were walking a tightrope in its throes, the only thing that mattered ,was how much you trusted the person walking it with you.”
Author: Neve Wilder

Quote: “A powerful woman knows how to dust herself off and shine just like a diamond, even after the worst has happened to her.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “A powerful woman knows how to hold others by the hand and help them stand.”
Author: Gift Gugu Mona

Quote: “As if you couldn't like one place and want to see another.”,
Author: V.E. Schwab

Quote: “2021: Happy New Year!,Me: ...,2021: What's wrong?,Me: I'm not sure I'm going to be happy this year.,2021: You will.,Me: ”
Author: Chinthia Indah

Quote: “I haven't figured out just yet,if it's brave or stupid,to live so boldly,but I'm going to keep,doing it anyway”
Author: McKayla Paige Arnold

Quote: “Chasing riches and wealth for their own sake is empty and void; but if one seeks and pursues unselfish purpose, the riches and wealth will automatically be attracted to accomplish the assignment; and that is very satisfying and fulfilling.”
Author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

Quote: “My brother says I don't talk enough so he hoped this notebook would give me a place to put my thoughts. Every now and then, I dress my thoughts in the clothing of a poem. Try to figure out if my world changes once I set down these words. ,This was the first time someone gave me a place to collect my thoughts. In some ways, it seemed like he was saying that my thoughts were important. From that day forward I've written every single day. Sometimes it seems like writing is the only way I keep from hurting.”
Author: Elizabeth Acevedo

Quote: “If you think I will be anything lessYou must not know me, ,For I am me.”
Author: Tony Garcia

Quote: “If you are born to be different & have purpose. If you are born to do something really great then don’t let the dogma of world & people come in between. Don’t let the doubt overshadow the purpose.,Be yourself, respect yourself, thank god for giving you that great purpose, believe that you have that power to make it happen & universe will going to help you to cultivate it. Work towards it every single day, nourish it! No matter how bad things go, make it work! Just make it work! ,Yes, you may feel that you are tiny little dot!,But you need to realize that there is one more tiny little dot in the Universe & that tiny dot is nothing less than a planet which goes through several tough changes to give life to billions of species!,Have a great grit!,– NitikaS”
Author: Nitika Sharma

Quote: “Just having a place to sit and be thankful each day improves mental health.”
Author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

Quote: “Limitations are not a dead end.”
Author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

Quote: “Thoughts are not fluid. Sometimes they rush like a river then get plugged up out of nowhere.”
Author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

Quote: “I found my voice within the Pagan community.”
Author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

Quote: “The Whole world is small to hide until you find the world within.”
Author: Varun K. Singh

Quote: “The reader should be able to imagine himself inhabiting the house, walking the streets, sitting by the river. All the writer needs to achieve this is,the real expression of his tangible imaginations on a piece of paper.”
Author: Adewale Joel

Quote: “The magic is in the words, my dear girl. When you bend one's thoughts with words that touch the soul, they call it inspiration.”
Author: Amita Trasi

Quote: “Happiness does not depend on what we have; it depends on how we feel about what we have.”
Author: — Robert Gill Jr. (Happiness Power: How to Unleash Your Power and Live a More Joyful Life)

Quote: “A spectacle of light illuminates a room full of darkness.”
Author: Cyro Sanchez

Quote: “Make love your compass. Always, in all ways!”
Author: Caterina Barregar

Quote: “Yesterday is the reason you mustn't let your today be a lesson.”
Author: Timi Sultan Adeoye

Quote: “An honest and sincere hearted person always aims to inspire others.”
Author: Santosh Kumar (San)

Quote: “Strength is what is granted to me by God so that He might show through me what He wishes to do through others.”
Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

Quote: “This is a door. You can close it and stay here, outside, by yourself, or you can walk through it and join them”
Author: Jennifer Weiner

Quote: “And I could see her for what she was... Someone who wasn't invincible.. Someone who had flaws, and things she wanted.”
Author: Jennifer Weiner

Quote: “I looked at them all. 'You can't spend your life up here.'","The moment I said it I remembered Alan saying tat in a way he HAD spent his life up here, That his memories of the Moon were so bright and vivid that the things he did on Earth seemed grey by comparison. And I thought how completely cosmic it would be if I could fix that for them. If I could make it so that part of them was always up here. So that when they were back on Earth and their dads were yelling and pushing them on, they could just tune out and come back up here, where -- in their brightest memories -- they would always be kids.”
Author: Frank Cottrell Boyce

Quote: “Ich kenne Menschen, in denen steckt ein ganzes Universum, unermeßlich. Aber herauskriegen tut man es nicht. Ums Verrecken nicht. Das am Rande.”
Author: Patrick Süskind

Quote: “Seek wisdom from the sages, justice is waiting at the gate. Freedom is for all ages. Read the scriptures, to see the true picture.”
Author: Ora Bigio

Quote: “Look at how far you’ve come. Look at how much you’ve grown. If I don’t tell you enough that I am proud, I need you to know that I am. If I don’t tell you enough that I love you, I need you to know that I do.”
Author: Kirsten Robinson

Quote: “You have grown a backbone where your wishbone used to be. You have learned how to say no, you have learned how to walk away. Do you remember when they broke you? It felt like life as you knew it was over. It felt like your rib cage cracked apart. You have rebuilt yourself; you have stitched loss into gain, sadness into joy.”
Author: Kirsten Robinson

Quote: “We'll be fine’, Pierre-Auguste Renoir said assertively. ‘We are good artist; we know that. Remember what Baudelaire said before he died: "Nothing can be done except little by little." That is what we are doing, it is not big, but it is something!”
Author: Will Gompertz

Quote: “Fear can force employees to execute projects, but it cannot energize people. Fear is crippling and inhibiting, and it is one of the most dehumanizing forces in the workplace.”
Author: Ken Costa

Quote: “There is nothing needful than to live thy neighbour as yourself.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “But once we know that behind most fear lurks a lie, then we can ignore it by remembering God's truths in our lives.”,
Author: Ken Costa

Quote: “Anyone can nurture a myth about their life if they have enough manure, so if the grass looks greener on the other side of the fence, that's probably because it's full of shit.”
Author: Fredrik Backman

Quote: “If with the same 26 alphabet letters we form a constructive world, then there will be no place for destruction in all its forms.”
Author: Mireille Saba Redford

Quote: “Shallow waters don't lead to new continents.”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “A veiled irony, how true inspiration so rarely comes from within. Or if it does, it is so personal, it almost qualifies as selfishness.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “In a sense she [Sylvia Plath] was the victim of an obsessive talent that sent her out into the world to gather sensations and seek wounds that could provide creative inspiration. Having acquired the wounds she stuck her fingers into them, turning the pain and blood into lines of highly subjective poetry that both repel and fascinate the reader.”
Author: Nancy Hunter Steiner

Quote: “There's nothing you want that you cannot have.”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “It's more risky to take no risks at all.”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “Is the movie of your LIFE how you intended it to be?,Do you feel you’re the star of your own movie, or is someone else – a celebrity, royalty, a privileged toff, a super rich person – always in the main shot? Are you an out-of-focus blur in the background? How close does your movie stick to the original script you intended for your life? If it’s nowhere near, isn’t it time to change the script or change your life? Become the star of your own movie, transform it into colour rather than the dull black and white it is now. Ask yourself – if the movie of your life was in a cinema, would you watch it? Would you want other people to see it? Would they walk out because it’s so boring? Even worse, would you walk out too and demand a refund?”
Author: Adam Weishaupt

Quote: “Addressing the problem, and then taking this second step to fix the cause of the problem, distinguishes the people who are in control from the people who are not in control - the successful from the unsuccessful.”
Author: Sam Carpenter

Quote: “All that matters is what you do next.”
Author: Hrishikesh Agnihotri

Quote: “...cultivation of the right mindset and the use of the right mental attitude are the ultimate goals that will deliver to us the life we have only dreamed of thus far...”
Author: Elle Sommer

Quote: “Getting up each morning choosing to be happy is to shape circumstances instead of being shaped by them.”
Author: Elle Sommer

Quote: “Some days it's hard to believe that we're all one. But I believe if we keep radiating good energy in the world it will come back to us a hundredfold.”
Author: Elle Sommer

Quote: “If you stay strong and humble by serving others, worshipping God, and being strong in the Word and watchful of your character, you will remain fully alive in your calling.”
Author: Ken Costa

Quote: “The only danger of the moment was that Jo - and Gabe - might let those seconds pass away without seeing them as Ursa did, as her own teeny tweak of fate in a vast and miraculous universe, as a wondrous gift she was offering to them.”
Author: Glendy Vanderah

Quote: “Happenchance sparks with no matter who, waiting for love to arrive. To anyone, here I am, longing, as long as I am alive.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “I will remember where the dark used to be. I remember what it looked like. What it felt like, what it did to me, what it did to others. And I will keep the light on.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “It is the present now and at noon yesterday, it was the present then. When noon tomorrow arrives, it will also be the present. The present is all there is.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Silver starlight blankets the cool night. Our eyes reflecting something, suspecting, could it be this is love?”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Weakness is to take a knee, fear I will not succeed. If I can choose destiny and move, then I am freed.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Destiny has called you to be a god. Are you hero enough for the task? Will you switch on your inner “hero program”, or slink off to the shopping mall or the sports stadium and put it off for yet another day? Maybe you’ll take in a movie. So much easier to watch others doing the heavy lifting, and the actors are just faking it anyway. Where are the real heroes? Where are YOU?!”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “What you do is to teach a hundred what I taught you, and inspire each of them to teach a hundred. That's how it's always done.”
Author: Daniel Quinn

Quote: “We won't attain maturity unless we cultivate the wisdom to discriminate which deeds of our ancestors we need to reject and which achievements we need to take inspiration from.”
Author: S.L. Bhyrappa

Quote: “The role of a writer is to shed light on major issues, to speak the unspoken, and make others see the unseen, feel the unfelt, and hear the unheard.”
Author: Mireille Saba Redford

Quote: “The bravest star is not the one that shines among the rest, it is the one that shines alone in a darkened sky.”
Author: Luis E. Cavazos Emotional Beauty

Quote: “If cancer goes untreated, or is not surgically removed and rooted out, it will invade the body again and kill it.”
Author: Mireille Saba Redford

Quote: “We crawl by inches. What we find today we will wipe from the blackboard tomorrow and reject it—unless it shows up again the day after tomorrow. And if we find anything which would suit us, that thing we will eye with particular distrust.”
Author: Bertolt Brecht

Quote: “My mom greatest worry and towards,same I am doing scurry. She wants,to hide me from everyone but i am not,a piece of metal akin to gold or diamond.,I am breathing and have my wings.,I want to go out and play with my friends.,Do I have any friends? I have no one,no one no one. My uncovered legs ,are a matter of fear, and now they are turned into smear. ,A teen life is more like an old ,granny life. ,No fun nothing left. Thats an irony”
Author: mehak vc

Quote: “My past has no power over the fabulous future I will create today.”
Author: Lisa Messenger

Quote: “Home isn't a place it's a feeling”,
Author: Carmel Harrington

Quote: “May we all grow up to be strong like her”
Author: Kelli Estes

Quote: “Wisdom is learning to discern God's ways in a cluttered world of opinions, personal thoughts, mantras, and make-believe.”
Author: Ken Costa

Quote: “Human history is full of accomplishments that were once labelled absurd and impossible”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “Uncorrected errors evolve into terror”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “Be the best you everyday, get better every new day.”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “Think for yourself. Save yourself. Enlighten yourself. Let no one control you. Your salvation is your business, not anyone else’s. It’s up to you to make contact with the divine order. It’s up to you to become God. No one else can do it for you. You can be everything you want to be if you put in the effort. No one says it will be easy. Why should it be? Why should it not be the most difficult and challenging task of all? After all, how can becoming God ever be anything other than the hardest accomplishment humanly conceivable? But isn’t that precisely,what makes it so glorious; the supreme endeavour, the ultimate questthe final and surest meaning of life, of existence itself? That is why,the Holy Grail is the most sought-after object of all.”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “Do the unusual and you'll achieve the impossible.”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “There's no other you on earth, that's why you're the best.”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “When you have “failed better” enough times, you will surely succeed because you have dialectically honed you skills to the level where you are vastly superior to your competitors. Knowing how to “fail better” is one of the greatest challenges and opportunities in life. As you learn the mistakes of each failure, your knowledge, resilience and talent grow enormously. Eventually you stand transformed, ready to be an astonishing success, tested in the fire, prepared to rise up from the ashes of defeat, to follow the wondrous Phoenix to the highest peaks.”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “Even if it seems as though our lives have been reduced to ashes, hope persists. New and more powerful life is still possible. “What does not kill me makes me stronger,” declared Nietzsche with his customary indomitable defiance of misfortune. In other words, if you’re still standing, if you’ve been thrown into a crucible of struggle and you haven’t perished, then, if you did but know it, you’re much stronger than before, a person who knows how to survive. Now you need only make that inner strength explicit. Dominate the world. Don’t let the world dominate you.”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “Elevate your thinking and you'll levitate to greater levels.”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “The greatest love, such as the troubadours proclaimed, also requires supremely challenging obstacles. It is by overcoming obstacles that we transform ourselves into higher beings, that we find the deepest love and discover our inner hero. So, don’t flee from obstacles, don’t bemoan your fate. If you are faced with difficulties, smile! If you can beat the odds, you have a chance to become something astounding. Don’t run away. Tackle them head on.”
Author: Adam Weishaupt

Quote: “You should be looking for difficulties, not the easy option. The easy path is the life to anonymity and endless regret. The hard path is the one that gives you a purpose in life and brings out everything best in you. You have to become smarter, stronger, superior to overcome resistance. If you flee from the hard path, you will never encounter your higher self. How do you differentiate yourself from six and half billion other people? By doing hard things. The harder the challenge you take on, the fewer people will be in competition with you. You will have to make enormous sacrifices. If you don’t, you won’t achieve anything.,It’s as simple as that.”
Author: Adam Weishaupt

Quote: “We will appeal to the highest aspirations of people, not their basest instincts. We seek to make all people into Gods, no matter how retarded, deluded and dumb they may be at the moment. We will transform their consciousness. When we are finished, it won’t be Hegel and Nietzsche who are unknown amongst the masses, but the vacuous celebrities.”
Author: Adam Weishaupt

Quote: “Curiosity did not kill the Cat, it transformed the Cat into a Lion.”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “If people are farsighted, I mean if they really can see just like a bird in a tree. Probably, a lot of people would have been more careful how they go about life with the rest of humanity.”
Author: Nurudeen Ushawu

Quote: “Curiosity didn't kill the Cat, it transformed the Cat into a Lion.”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “Never give-up on yourself when you have a bad day, and somebody will not give up on you.”
Author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

Quote: “The best of Man is not better than the least of God”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “When you reach the TOP, don't STOP, keep moving UP.”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “Isn’t it time to make yourself into a work of art? Isn’t it time to deliver the performance expected by the gods? There’s nothing worse than lack of ambition. The gods are interested only in those who reach for the stars, regardless of whether they will set their hands on fire.”
Author: Adam Weishaupt

Quote: “All is one, self is none, love oneself, life's not done.”
Author: LZ

Quote: “You want to belong - connect. You want to win - fight. You want to die - sleep. You want to fly, learn to cry.”
Author: LZ

Quote: “Purpose, it's everywhere. Choose it wisely and with intent.”
Author: LZ

Quote: “The best safety lies in fear,-Shakespeare”
Author: Rebecca Hodge

Quote: “Kindness is as kindness does.”
Author: ruth ware

Quote: “This life you are leading right now is not a dress rehearsal. You are right here right now. You are on stage and everyone is watching. You are not practicing behind the curtain. The curtain is up. Everyone can see what you are doing. Well, what are you doing? How are you using your life? Life is not an exercise in shrinking. It’s about growing … growing to stupendous proportions that amaze the world. You can’t grow your body, but your mind can stretch infinitely, all the way to divinity. It’s time. Time to become a god.”
Author: Ranty McRanterson

Quote: “If you are not playing your A-game, what game are you playing? Are you waiting for the sun to come out? Do you need an umbrella? This is not a B-Movie for B-listers. Is there anything worse, anything more sickening, than people not giving it their all? Get off your fucking knees, get off your fucking asses, get off your fucking bellies, and fucking do something with your lives. What the fuck are you waiting for? This is not a dress rehearsal. This is fucking it. Right here, right now. Well? Have you forgotten your lines? If you’re not going to show up when it matters, fuck off. Get with the fucking program. If you’re not ready to perform, get off the fucking stage.”
Author: Ranty McRanterson

Quote: “A woman who is insecure *probably* does not feel right about herself. (Internal problem). A woman who is intuitive *definitely* feels something is not right. (External awareness). Note the difference.”
Author: Liz Faublas

Quote: “The things you allow to control your mind will also control your perception of reality”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “We can all escape from whatever dilemma we’re in by adopting the correct attitude. It’s a tough lesson, but to learn it is to gain the means to transcend ordinary life.”,
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “Never quit on a bad day.”
Author: Ben Crawford

Quote: “Witchcraft is, I believe, the practice of entering into relation with the world, of exerting your will in it and among it, and learning how to work with it in ways that are fruitful for yourself and the world.”
Author: Alice Tarbuck

Quote: “There is a mystery about the divine inspiration of human effort, and we do well to acknowledge it and receive Holy Scripture as it is, from the hand of God through the minds of human beings committed to be channels of his will.”
Author: Donald English

Quote: “No one’s coming to save the world. Not Jesus Christ, not anyone. If the world is to be saved then it’s our responsibility, no one else’s. The very act of believing in a Saviour is a disgrace. It’s cowardice and laziness, an abdication of our personal obligations. The logic of our central theme of “becoming God” is that each of us has to don the divine mantle. Salvation is our business, not someone else’s. It’s time to be active, not passive. It’s time to make things happen; not sit back and wait for others. It’s time to create our own “Rapture”, not pray to someone else to make it happen. We have to stop being alienated from our divine spark. It’s time to burnish it and let it illuminate the world.”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “We can all escape from whatever dilemma we’re in by,adopting the correct attitude. It’s a tough lesson, but to learn it is to gain the means to transcend ordinary life.”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “If you wait until you have a comfort level in your business, you may wait a very long time. Share what you know. Talk less to more people. Keep it simple. Admit you don’t know something. But don’t quench your enthusiasm about your work. People may not believe what you say but that does not mean that they can’t believe you because of how and why you say it. Set yourself on fire today and see how many come to watch you burn!”
Author: Chris J. Gregas

Quote: “It really is a question of what I will do with what I have rather than what I might be able to do if I were different.”
Author: Ken Costa

Quote: “You shape yourself, you make yourself. There is no one to save you other than yourself. It’s not Christ, Mohammed or Moses who’s responsible for your life, it’s you. In the end, souls judge themselves.”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “You have to become the person who deserves what you desire.”
Author: Rob Liano

Quote: “If we embark on Nietzsche’s project to become Supermen, to be creators and value makers, to rise to the highest heights, then we are donning the mantle of God. It is by walking in God’s shoes that we enormously increase our chances of contacting our divine spark.”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “Isn’t it time be a hero, one that your yourself have created and defined? Isn’t it time to be the god you have it within you to be? Leave the broken world behind. Create a new world. This time one that isn’t screwed. Let’s stop being as mad as hell. Let’s stop the,decline of humanity into increasing craziness. Let’s create a Society of Quality, a Society of Excellence, a,Society of Self-Actualization. Above all, a Society of Divine Humanity, where we have given glorious expression to the divine spark that resides within us all.”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “When we are preparing to give up, fear plays a less important role in the situation we find ourselves part of. We reach a point where we have nothing to lose, therefore nothing to fear”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “We succeed if you succeed ... so succeed. Nothing would please us more than for those who have appreciated our work to exceed it, to excel, to be marvels. Our success is your success. Your success is our success. We are all in this together. We are here to provide the path. We want you to walk it and be all you can be.”
Author: Brother Spartacus

Quote: “Isn't it time you stood on the high steps, or in front of the podium, and started making your address to the world? What's your message? If you don't have one, what then?”
Author: Steve Madison

Quote: “It’s not about us, it’s about you. Talented people really can change the world, and all the people we have quoted in this book are talented. You have barely begun to explore your potential. The things you are capable of achieving will astound the world. Do it! Make it happen. Seriously, your capabilities are extraordinary. If you put your mind and your will to it, you will achieve the wonders of the world!”
Author: Brother Spartacus

Quote: “No greater affirmation of life is possible than to wish every part of it to return to you forever. It is the sublime moment when a person can look at his life, no matter what it consists of – good, bad, or indifferent – and find within himself the desire never to be freed from any aspect of it that allows a human being to be transformed into an Übermensch, the supreme life affirmer.”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “I also began to appreciate how you learn far more from defeat or during difficult times than you do from winning. I also understood that it was actually OK to make mistakes, provided you really learn from them and always try to avoid them in the future - Frank Arnesen”
Author: Peter Mukherjee A Few Wise Words

Quote: “Discovering a calling is not like doing a Google search; it does not happen in an instant. We need to be intentional about taking action rather than just waiting for our calling to drop into our laps.”
Author: Ken Costa

Quote: “When you aim low, its easy to achieve your dreams.”
Author: Frank J. Edler

Quote: “The easiest way to start and lead the Revolution is to embody the Revolution both inner and outer. You have to become the cause itself. The best way to attract the greatest minds is to become one of them!”
Author: Brother Spartacus

Quote: “They waited in anguish,Till letters petrified in their hands...,And when the winds blew their little ones far awayWords changed,But the chair stayed there.,(From 'The Waltz of Dust', poetry collection)”
Author: Mireille Saba Redford

Quote: “Join our movement, our dialectical adventure, our mission to release humanity’s hidden potential. Make your own unique dialectical contribution. It’s time for the renaissance of the human race. We want to illuminate the cosmos with the light of humanity’s glittering, glinting, shimmering sparks of every conceivable bright colour. We are marching towards perfection. Reject the past. Reject the Old World Order, the old religions, the old politics, the old rules of society. It’s time to begin again. Now, finally, we understand the way forward – as a dialectical progression towards the Omega Point of Omega Humanity. The time has come to revalue all values.”
Author: Michael Faust

Quote: “Nation building is a selfless motivated action”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “Don’t waste your time copying and pasting the God Series into your FB, but instead copy paste the traits and the qualities of worldhistoric figures into YOUR LIFE! Copy and paste their successful traits, their inspirational skills, their work ethic, their perseverance, and their undeniable confidence INTO YOU and YOUR LIFE!”
Author: Brother Spartacus

Quote: “Even when a fish becomes passive about it's ownership of the aquatic environment, it will die of thirst”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “People don't recognize opportunity quickly because it starts with the letter O”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “Human history is full of accomplishments that were once labeled absurd and impossible”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “You're a key individual in the transformation of your nation”
Author: Constance Friday

Quote: “The very centre of your heart is where life begins - the most beautiful place on earth.”
Author: RUMI

Quote: “Reject the fake life. Reject the life of the fraud. Reject the persona life, the masked life. Stop faking it. Stop living in bad faith. Shatter the false ceiling. Become who you are. Become authentic. Get active. Get real. Get going.”,
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “If everything around seems dark, look again, you may be the light.”
Author: Rumi

Quote: “What We Are Today Is A Result Of Our Choices Made In The Past !”
Author: Dilshad Merchant

Quote: “The most fulfilled people are those who completely express themselves via their work. You know when this happens because even though you are working very hard – much harder than ordinary people – everything is in a sense effortless. Once you exist in such a way, you cannot imagine doing anything else. You do what you do because it is the actualization of who you are. It doesn’t matter if it leads to external success or not. You have internally achieved everything you hoped for and you wouldn’t swap it for anything. So, what about you? Are you all over the place? Have you not yet clicked with the activity that seems effortless to you and fully satisfying, or, if you have, do you doubt that you could make a living from it, hence are plagued by doubts and the need to compromise? Life is a great struggle. It crushes almost everyone. Only the world-historic figures survive the Meat Grinder.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “I refuse to be your battery,You don't get to drain me anymore,You don't get to charge me anytime ,for anything anymore,You don't get to judge me-,to think I'm used up and be indecisive daily,whether you'd like to get a new one,You don't get to connect to me,or keep testing me,You haven't saved up enough,integrity to afford this high quality,battery,The only thing I will allow,is for you to replace me-,Good luck.”
Author: Casey Renee Kiser

Quote: “If it's going to go bad, let it. As long as you have done your best to fix mistake for a likely change of course. There is no difference with doing everything right and things work out, or sometimes don't.,Life is about attaining completion and a full circle. Everything has to complete course, and happen for something new one to begin.”
Author: Andrew-Knox B Kaniki

Quote: “If it's going to go bad, let it. As long as you have done your best to fix a mistake for a likely change of course. There is no difference with doing everything right and things work out, or sometimes don't.,Life is about attaining completion and a full circle. Everything has to complete course, and happen for something new one to begin.”
Author: Andrew-Knox B Kaniki

Quote: “If something is going bad, let it. As long as you have done your best to fix a mistake for a likely change of course. There is no difference with doing everything right and things work out, or sometimes don't.,Life is about attaining completion and a full circle. Everything has to complete course, and happen for something new one to begin.”
Author: Andrew-Knox B Kaniki

Quote: “We have enjoyed the feast generously laid out for us by Mother Earth, but now the plates are empty and the dining room is a mess. It's time we started doing the dishes in Mother Earth's kitchen. Doing dishes has gotten a bad rap, but everyone who migrates to the kitchen after a meal knows that that's where the laughter happens, the good conversations, the friendships. Doing dishes, like doing restoration, forms friendships.”
Author: Robin Wall Kimmerer

Quote: “There are two types of people in the world: the history makers, and everyone else. Are you ahistorical, outside history, just along for the ride, for the shits and giggles, or are you actually helping to shape history? If you’re not on the side of the history shapers and history makers, fuck off. You’re irrelevant. You’re a joke. Play your part. Spectators not welcome. Sideline snipers – what a waste of space. If you’re not in front of the curtain, where are you? Hiding? You’re invisible, and the world doesn’t care whether you are there or not. Get on the fucking stage and deliver the best performance of your life. We have brought you to the dance. Hop if you can.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “Commit fully to your sacred cause. Do not hesitate. Do not draw back. Be bold, be powerful. Do not delay. Start now.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “When you need something in life, you need to ask for it.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “We pity all those who can't see beyond their own dark, inner emotional storms to the bright dawn ahead. Fuck 'em! Revalue all values. Let's transform this world. Let's transform this universe.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “Scientism has done its best to undermine reason and logic. Those of us that belong to the Army of Reason have never left the battlefield. We soldier on, resisting the fierce current trying to push us back onto the shore. We do not deviate from our course. Our destination is clear. The stars shine on us. All is well with the world. The Empyrean lies before us. The fire of truth burns within us. Nothing shall ever quench it. Change is coming. The future is ours. De l’audace, encore de l’audace, et toujours de l’audace. Audacity, more audacity, and ever more audacity.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “See behind the curtain. Tear aside the veil. See reality. See things as they really are. See the naked lunch on the end of your fork. Do you have the stomach for it? Fuck the bland. Fuck the Ignavi. If the game of life is too tough for you, get to fuck. Life is not a spectator sport. Make a difference or lie down and let the world trample you into the ground. This is no country for hollow men.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “Without fiction, there is no imagination; without imagination, no dreams; without dreams, facts hardly matter.”
Author: Charles Lemert

Quote: “Always go to the source of the spring to fetch water.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “It's time to stop being spectators. Do things. Join things. Make things happen. Make a contribution. Make a difference. Get out there. Don't keep calm and carry on. Get angry, and change this benighted world. Is there anything else than the masses who wait for others to do things?”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “We are all part of a God factory. Gods are what come off the production line at the end of an eons-long, protracted, dialectical process designed to overcome every possible obstacle, trial, setback, difficulty and ordeal. You need to be a God to survive the dialectic. It takes you to hell and forces you to confront the Devil. The Devil is you. The Devil is your Shadow. Only Devils can become Gods. That is the law of the dialectic.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “We need a road of trials, a succession of ordeals, to provide the resistance we must overcome in order to become moral (rational), which is to say intelligent. If we met no resistance, there would be no need for us to evolve. For a system to evolve into God, it needs the maximum possible resistance – it needs the Devil. The “world” is Satanic in order that we must become God to overcome it.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “Humanity must focus on the future. The past has dug enough graves, and built enough madhouses for true believers. You don’t need to be defined by the past. Have the courage to become something new and wonderful.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “There is no certainty like faith in God,”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “God is not being. God is becoming. You yourself are becoming God. Shouldn't you start acting the part?”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “As we come to understand the collective might of small contributions, we can be released from the individualistic anxiety that comes with comparing ourselves to others.”
Author: Ken Costa

Quote: “The paradigm shift is coming. It’s written into the dialectic. We are the pathfinders of the dialectic. We are the vanguard of the enlightenment. Someone has to be way ahead of the game to lead everyone else forward. The pioneers, the scouts, the adventurers, the radicals, the explorers, those that first step into the unknown along paths never trod before, surrounded everywhere by darkness, must be of exceptional character, boldness, curiosity and courage.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “Boldness, boldness, always boldness. Join us. Join the advance guard of humanity. Join Higher Humanity, HyperHumanity. We are the plan, we are the future. Our sacred cause is to make humanity divine. We are here to enlighten the world, to immanentize the eschaton on earth, to create the community of gods, the society of the divine. We are the Protogenoi, the first generation of the coming gods and goddesses. It is our solemn duty to create all the other gods and goddesses.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “We are Evolution. We are the Revolution. We have come to revalue all values. It’s time to get off your knees. Friends, fellow gods and goddesses, it’s time to rise. Join our Sacred Cause. Transform this world. Undergo the ultimate personal and collective metamorphosis. The old gods are dead. We are the new gods. On whose side will you stand on the fateful fields of Armageddon? Will you support the evil tyrants of the past, or will you make your stand shoulder to shoulder with those who will never serve any gods but will instead become gods themselves?”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “Get off your knees. Stand up. God is not outside you. You are God. And who can defeat an army of Gods? Escape your chains. What have you got to lose? Don’t you want to taste freedom? Don’t you want to step into the light? Don’t you want to be a heroic bearer of the sacred, ineffable starlight and the bright flame that can never be extinguished? Join us. Embrace the future.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “Come with us to the summit of the pyramid, to the perfection of the universe and the perfection of yourself. At the top of the pyramid are the gods and goddesses themselves – fully optimized, perfected minds. They have reached the Hyper Point, the Point Above All. Join us. Join the Society of the Divine. Join the Community of the Gods. Do not worship God. Become God.”
Author: Thomas Stark

Quote: “I love life, how could despair win me over in those times? It happens, and I learned that when it does, it is people who are there for us. It is the support we need, and we will always get once we ask for it.”,
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “I’m always vocal about what I need. My instinctive impulses are difficult to resist.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “He realized he couldn't be a believer in Jesus and remain angry with his family's killers. He realized it was simply incompatible.”
Author: Brant Hansen

Quote: “My poems are my breath in words.”
Author: Gregory Joseph Firlotte

Quote: “What is poetry? It is one heart speaking to another.”
Author: Gregory Joseph Firlotte

Quote: “Who can I inspire but myself?”
Author: Marty Rubin

Quote: “You were born to believe.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “At the time your book was written, the full story of the monarch migration was unknown to humanity.","When did they find it out?" Preston asked.,The answer, to Dellarobia's astonishment, was within Ovid's lifetime. He had been just a bit older than Preston when the discovery was announced in the National Geographic, in 1976. A Canadian scientist chased the mystery his whole life, devising a tag that would stick to butterfly wings, recruiting volunteers to help track them, losing the trail many times. And then one winter's day, as an old man on shaky legs, he climbed a mountain in Michoacan to see what must have looked like his dream of heaven... Ovid could still quote passages of the article from memory: They carpeted the ground in their tremulous legions. He said he remembered exactly where he was when he read that article, and how he felt.,"Where were you?","Outside the post office, sitting on a lobster crate. I spent a lot of Saturdays there. My mother let me read the magazines before they went to their subscribers. I was so excited by the photos in that article, I ran all the way down Crown Street, all the way to West End and out a sandy road called Fortuna to the sea. I must have picked up a stick somewhere, because I remember jumping up and whacking every branch I passed, leaving a trail of flying leaves. When I got to the sea I didn't know what to do, so I threw the stick in Perseverance Bay and ran back. It was the happiest day of my life.",Dellarobia wanted, of course, to know why.,"Why," he repeated, thinking about it. "It was just like any schoolboy. I thought everything in the world was already discovered. Already in my books. A lot of dead stuff that put me to sleep. That was the day I understood the world is still living.”
Author: Barbara Kingsolver

Quote: “Life isn't really about us, it's about those around us.”
Author: Frank Kayihura

Quote: “Asking people for advice and getting mad when it's not what you wanna hear is like eating food you know you are allergic to.”
Author: Liz Faublas

Quote: “Very few of us are Tolstoys or Gandhis, let alone bodhisattvas. We are just ordinary human beings caught in the groove of working or bringing up families, or for too many, merely surviving. Our lives offer only limited choices. However, peace does start with the individual, and even in the most mundane of lives it can be expressed in vivid and compelling ways.”
Author: Steve Killelea

Quote: “. I believe peace, when properly defined, is the first fundamental human right that makes all other rights possible. The right to life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness, to use the examples enshrined as ‘unalienable rights’ in the US Constitution, will remain forever out of reach in the absence of peace.”
Author: Steve Killelea

Quote: “I believe peace, when properly defined, is the first fundamental human right that makes all other rights possible. The right to life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness, to use the examples enshrined as ‘unalienable rights’ in the US Constitution, will remain forever out of reach in the absence of peace.”
Author: Steve Killelea

Quote: “In the journey of life I try to focus on living and learning, as opposed to existing.”
Author: Angel Moreira

Quote: “YOUR SOURCE OF INSPIRATION INSPIRES YOUR INTENTIONS”
Author: Qwana M. "BabyGirl" Reynolds-Frasier

Quote: “Indeed, the key to making the best of your life, the key to discovering your calling, is to be with Jesus.”
Author: Ken Costa

Quote: “This morning,I heard the sun beggingAnd the birds sadly calling my nameThis morning ,I felt a breeze of love knocking ,On the other side of a dusty window ,That I barely remember the last time I left openThis morning ,I let love and peace find their way back home again,This morning ,I kissed my Nights goodbye and welcome each loss ,as a leap of hope,And, a lesson I’ve gratefully learned …”
Author: Samiha Totanji

Quote: “Life is like a big cave with numerous doors. Only there's mist around our eyes, and we can't see them. ,When one door closes, the other opens, and when the second one closes, third opens and so on and so forth. ,So never give up....”
Author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

Quote: “Are you a revolutionary? Don’t sit on the fence. Be a man of action, someone who makes a difference.”
Author: Mike Hockney

Quote: “Never give up on Hope' ~ RC”
Author: Rosa Carrafa

Quote: “It did not really matter what we expected from life but rather what life expected from us.”
Author: Viktor E. Frankl

Quote: “I am the master of my fate, / I am the captain of my soul.”
Author: William Ernest Henley

Quote: “Believe that your day is going to be good and leave it up to the day to prove you wrong.”
Author: Todd Stocker

Quote: “Life's rainy days... They bring out the rainbows, but they also bring out the worms. Pay attention to who's who and what's what.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “Be your light self.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “At the core of each of us is an identity secure in Christ, which leads to an ongoing, unbroken relationship with him.”
Author: Ken Costa

Quote: “It’s more important to simply be present than to be brilliant.”
Author: Tania Israel

Quote: “The price of doing whats right is not always based on results. If you dont get the result you want. Its not because you made a bad decision, its just the cost of doing whats right”
Author: Janna Cachola

Quote: “You have watched me crawlYou have watched me walkYou have watched me runNow, you watch me fly!”
Author: Md. Ziaul Haque

Quote: “They don’t want people who are smart enough to sit around the kitchen table and figure out how badly they’re getting fucked by a system that threw them overboard thirty years ago. They want people who are just smart enough to run the machines and do the paperwork, and just dumb enough to passively accept all the increasingly shitty jobs with the less pay, reduced benefits, the end of overtime—and the vanishing pension that disappears the minute you come to collect it. And now they’re coming for your Social Security. They want your retirement money. They want it back so they can give it to their criminal Wall Street friends. And you know what? They’ll get it! They’ll get it all. They count on the fact that Americans will remain willfully ignorant.”,The prophetic Mr. George Carlin,	“It’s just a ride. We can change it any time we want. It’s just a choice. No effort, no work, no job, no savings of money—a choice, right now, between fear and love. The eyes of fear want you to put bigger locks on your door, buy guns, close yourself off. The eyes of love instead see all of us as one. Here’s what we can do to make this world a better ride. Take all the money we spend on weapons every year and use it to feed and clothe the poor of the world. There will be enough to help every person in the world, not one left out—and we can explore space, both inner and outer, together, in peace.”,Bill Hicks,	“Try to learn to breathe deeply, really taste food when you eat, and when you sleep to really sleep. Try as much as possible to be wholly alive with all your might, and when you laugh, laugh like hell. And when you get angry, get good and angry. Try to be alive. You will be dead soon enough.”,William Saroyan”
Author: Carlin Hicks Saroyan

Quote: “Life is unmanageable when you are stateless.”,
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “I have to find that silver lining around the dark cloud looming over all of us.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “When things don’t go as planned in the journey to your destination, don’t give up. Defy defeat. Resist submission. Hold onto hope.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Aside from  there is nothing more important in this world than Self-Education. You too can unmasks the , about Personal Development; , can Develop a Genius Mindset and Unleash Their Full Potential and Achieve Unimaginable Success. -J.R. Fitzgerald”
Author: Me

Quote: “When I think of establishing a network, it’s like I’m looking down at a map of a nation- a nation that I’ve created.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “How can someone look back at a prison and call it home?”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Memories are powerful- whether filled with peace or turbulence.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Writing became my escape, the corner where I could take refuge in and be at peace.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “This is what conflict does. It spreads fear on all sides.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Writing was my escape from the overwhelming storm of emotions.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Having someone who believes in you makes a lot of difference. They don't have to make speeches. Just believing is usually enough.”
Author: Stephen King

Quote: “So hard to describe how I know that it's true, I don't quite know where to begin. Like conveying the sight of a sunrise to someone who's always slept in.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Well, didn't you look sharp with your boots when you met me on the path?,From two-tone to downtown Beirut but only halfway back,Stealing bits of wisdom from the shelf,Turned prisons into prisms of the self,And what do they know about the springtime or me and you?,Born in the midst of the long hot summer we lived through,Did they see you run for every rhyme?,Did we run for running out of time?,When even heroes have to die,No one lives forever, love, no one's wise to try,We're adding our own wisdom to the shelf,Stealing bits of paper, we had help,But working away, did we miss the passing of the time?,In your own flame you can wither though your passions still outshine,Did you read the writing on the wall?,Prophesying doom upon us all,But even heroes have to die,No one lives forever, love, no one's wise to try,But hidden in the writing on the wall,Many are the beauties of the fall”
Author: Ted Leo

Quote: “Principles, morals, religion and values, are all worth nothing when considering whether or not we are directly adding value to the spaces we are in and that surround us. Are we a valuable experience in the lives of other people? Be the valuable experience of life. Don't just talk about the castles of your mind.”
Author: C. JoyBell C.

Quote: “Aside from  there is nothing more important in this world than Self-Education. You too can unmasks the , about Personal Development; , can Develop a Genius Mindset and Unleash Their Full Potential and Achieve Unimaginable Success. -J.R. Fitzgerald”
Author: J.R. Fitzgerald

Quote: “Humanity wasn’t all about conflict, or about who stole land from whom, or who hate whom. It was about who helps you when you need it the most.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “I have always loved seeing people realize their dreams, small or big, a dream is a dream. It is where reality meets imagination.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Much of the time my smile is due to my happiness; I’ve been fortunate to have experienced the joy that I have. There is another smile though. It masks my deepest pains”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “There is no shame in asking for help when people are happy to offer it, and give it out of love. My network is based on that fundamental.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “From my youth, I was trained to endure rejections and change them into opportunities.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Few things faze me. My reflex is to plot the next move, take calculated risks, set a target, and reach it- even if it means exercising tremendous patience and attempting countless alternative routes to my goal.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Survival is something that comes naturally to a refugee.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Refugees face appalling living conditions that are unsafe and unsanitary. But a refugee can endure all of this with inborn talents and learned skills.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “My grandfather was the first to teach me not to be loyal to a political figure. “To agree is fine. To disagree is fine. To blindly follow, you will become like a sheep destined for the slaughterhouse,“ he would tell me.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “When things don’t go as planned in the journey to your destination, don’t give up. Defy defeat. Resist submission. Hold into hope.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “I love people’s imagination, especially when it involves conspiracy theories. Ouch!”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Even at time of fear and uncertainty, I never went to the darkness. Light was always my destination- the light at the end of the tunnel.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “An unspoken word is like the thorn of a rose: it hurts; only with its removal can the flower be held without pain”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “Light is always welcome in the dark.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “I have to fight to exist and resist, especially with a virus that is keeping us imprisoned.”
Author: Chaker Khazaal

Quote: “I don't know if there is a "right" way to pray, but I often wonder if I pray for the right things.”,
Author: Liz Faublas

Quote: “The final frontier is the inner frontier.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “You are the teacher you have always been looking for.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “Authenticity is the measure of our intuitive awakening.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “With words, we speak to life; with intuition, life speaks to us.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “You are only crazy until you succeed, then, you are genius.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “It's hard to explain my life; it's kind of like a mash up. When you're a kid and you think it's a good idea to mix all the paint colors and you think it's going to be awesome, but you find out it just all turns black.”
Author: Andrea McKenna Brankin

Quote: “In the stillness, intuition speaks.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “Connect with those who see your light and celebrate your flame.”
Author: Michele Gustafson

Quote: “Try, fail, tryUntil You die!”
Author: Md. Ziaul Haque

Quote: “You are being prepared for a success you can't yet see.”
Author: Michele Gustafson

Quote: “Not everyone will have the capacity to support your growth.”
Author: Michele Gustafson

Quote: “With your intuition, you can perceive the imperceptible, know the unknowable, and experience the impossible.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “John by Maisie Aletha Smikle,John the baptizer,Son of Liza,Ate no appetizer,And had nothing with fertilizer,Chosen to lead,He took heed,Filled with glory,He told the story,To get a flannel,They disrobe a camel,John wore it's skin,To keep warm within,While they lavish in castles,And ate lambs laced with honey,John lived among bristles,Eating locusts glazed with honey,John had no land,Nor a band,He kept no herd,Nor flocks of bird,Called he was indeed,None could do his deed,And keep up to speed,Paving the way to lead,John had no money,But he had honey,John used a staff,And kept no arms,God's enemies hated John,He threatened their insidious wrong,John called out the wretched,For light to expose their throng,Indeed none could do the deed of John,Who took martyrdom ,For the Kingdom,Then ascended for his mission on earth was done”
Author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

Quote: “When you don't learn from your intuition, you have to learn from your circumstances.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “When the world is loud, create your own peace.”
Author: Michele Gustafson

Quote: “Creativity isn't just about creating art -- it's about creating your life.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “Intuitives are made to lead the leaders because they exist at the threshold.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “It is better to risk destruction than to live with a compromise.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “Happiness is a side effect of living intuitively.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “Never deprive your God-given philosophy that could metamorphose your Emotional pressure for competence in saintlike-Glory. There's greatness in all of us that breaths innovatory fire.”
Author: Daniel Linn Lewis

Quote: “Being "stuck" is not always a bad thing. When we are off course, stuckness slows us down so we can get back on track.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “Hardness is what we see...,Success is what they see...”
Author: Ashik Venkat

Quote: “Enlightenment is not a goal to be attained; it is a state of being to be regained.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “Ladies, just accept it. Men & women are wired differently. They don't think like us or understand why we feel the way we do and are perplexed by a lot of what we say, and baffled by our actions. But they don't have to always "get you" to love you. What's important is that he's a good boyfriend, husband, father. If *that's* missing, the fact he won't watch "Real Housewives of ATL" with you is the least of your worries.”
Author: Liz Faublas

Quote: “All forms of suffering have one singular cause -- the disconnection from our true self.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “Intuition is our link to the greatest mysteries of life. It offers us a pathway to discover our purpose and place in the universe.”
Author: Kim Chestney

Quote: “There is no insanity like inspiration.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “learning more about your strengths is a good motivation to do even more”
Author: Anath Lee Wales

Quote: “Perfect the day.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “Moving in the right direction is better than arriving at wrong destination. Obstacles are good because they either take our time or change our direction so that we reach the right destination at right time.”
Author: Shunya

Quote: “You are iron plated gold, running here and there to save yourself from rust. Stop identifying with the thin layer of iron; you are the gold underneath.”
Author: Shunya

Quote: “Imagine a person who keeps looking at places in "Google Maps" app whole day but doesn't actually go to any place.,People who live in past or future are like that. They misuse the apps of mind that help us connect with past and future.”
Author: Shunya

Quote: “Believe that you will succeed, and you will !”
Author: Dilshad Merchant

Quote: “You are the books you read, the films you watch, the music you listen to, the people you meet, the dreams you have, and the conversations you engage in. You are what you take from these. You are the sound of the ocean, breath of the fresh air, the brightest light and the darkest corner.,You are a collective of every experience you have had in your life. You are every single second of every day. So drown yourself in a sea of knowledge and existence. Let the words run through your veins and the colors fill your mind until there is nothing left to do but explode, There are no wrong answers . Inspiration is everything. Sit back, relax, and take it all in.”
Author: Jac Vanek

Quote: “Be addicted to being amazing.”
Author: Angel Moreira

Quote: “She wasn’t sure if it was strength or numbness… But either way… She was going to get up and get through this.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “Some write because they love to, some write because they have talent…, I write because I have something to say…, and I think that something has yet to be said just the way I want it to be said…”
Author: Busara Bin Hekima

Quote: “Once you align your desires and beliefs, you can manifest anything in your life!”,
Author: Theresa Lewis

Quote: “We are all on the same page as we read God’s Word and thirst for a better understanding and closeness and relationship with Jesus.”
Author: Cheryl Rutledge-Brennecke

Quote: “The beginning is never the beginning. The ending is never the end.”
Author: Marlene G.

Quote: “Great things come with great smile. Wear it more !”
Author: Mac Alvi A. R

Quote: “Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better. ,Maya Angelou”
Author: Charlie Baxter

Quote: “We don’t have it all, but we have everything we need.”
Author: Mac Alvi A. R

Quote: “Ending the toxic cycle within your own life isn't easy. When you don't come from a healthy family, you do your best to ensure a healthy one comes from you.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “If the journey wasnt challenging the destination wouldn't be rewarding.,It's the challenge that makes it great”
Author: Foster Mkhabele

Quote: “Although I'm not cheap, but I'm an affordable person by nature.”
Author: Nurudeen Ushawu

Quote: “I'm a conqueror, I am born to win. I am not here to be a slave to the system.”
Author: Nurudeen Ushawu

Quote: “Allow divine intuition and infinite wisdom to show you the dream and lead you to it!”
Author: Theresa Lewis

Quote: “The intention of your dressing becomes the intention of your day.”
Author: Michele Gustafson

Quote: “Dressing well is not about fashion or vanity. It’s about self-expression, self-acceptance, self-love, and teaching others how to treat you.”
Author: Michele Gustafson

Quote: “Clarity creates freedom.”
Author: Michele Gustafson

Quote: “Confidence comes from finishing.”
Author: Michele Gustafson

Quote: “Legacy lives in those you’ve changed.”
Author: Michele Gustafson

Quote: “There are two simple ways to create this window of connection with your Divine Self:,When you are about to sleep or about to wake up, there is a short period where you are neither awake or asleep. This is when your mind is switched off, and you are directly connected with your Divine Self. Enter into silence, ask your Divine Self to draw you to itself. Then if you would like, ask for guidance, insight, or an answer. ,During the day you can take time out away from all gadgets, sit quietly, close your eyes, notice your breath, and give intention to make contact with your Divine Self, be open and receptive to all the inspiration and love offered to you.”
Author: Premlatha Rajkumar

Quote: “I see because I can.”
Author: Ankit Samrat

Quote: “I got up this morning with a plan to set the world on fire and I couldn't find my match.”
Author: Beverly Kelley

Quote: “Poetry is pure like prophesy”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Through peoples rage against others, they coached me too never show extreme aversion. I love everyone, hell with the discourteous who only display selfishness.',- D.L. Lewis”
Author: Daniel Linn Lewis

Quote: “Never deprive your God-given philosophy that could metamorphose your Emotional pressure for competence in saintlike-Glory. There's greatness in all of us that breaths innovatory fire.”
Author: Daniel Linn Lewis

Quote: “I still am me,I am the little girl,I still have wet sand on my feet,From the beach castles,I built with my hands,Nearby the sea,Which then later,Cold melted by the waves,But not in my dreams,In my dreams,The castles,Are now greater than,Those in fairytales”,
Author: Mirela Athanas

Quote: “I believe in happy endings,” she agreed, “And I believe in the gods who grant them. But I don’t believe in their silence damning us. If the gods never answer, then we learn to make happy endings of our own.”
Author: Varsha Ravi

Quote: “We don't need to save the world; we need to love people. We can't fix anything for anyone, but we can listen. We can love. We can empathize. And as long as we can, we should.”
Author: MARY SWAN-BELL

Quote: “Everything is always beginning again.”
Author: Jennifer E. Smith

Quote: “Genius is merely childhood recollected at will.”
Author: Charles Baudelaire

Quote: “Don't complain, contribute.”
Author: Simon Sinek

Quote: “Try to create. I want to tell people to create. Just start by creating your day. Then create your life.”
Author: Prince

Quote: “Write because you have a story to tell, not because you want a story to sell.”
Author: Paolo Mazzucato

Quote: “Each moment is a note in the song of today.”
Author: Michael Brant DeMaria

Quote: “I don't know who you are either, Rowena. " His fingers tightened around hers. "But I know who your not. You're not who your father made you. You're not who that Kinnaird fellow made you. You're who God made you. And perhaps now you have been given the opportunity to discover who that is. Freely", Brice ducked his head a bit, caught her gaze. "And if you really want to spite them, do you know what you should do?" He leaned closer, pitched his voice lower. "Thrive. Be happy.”
Author: Roseanna M. White

Quote: “I'm not stupid, I told myself. There's all kinds of things I can do”
Author: Joan  Bauer

Quote: “Encouragement elevates the spirit to celestial height.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “The journey of life is a joyful walk with Jehovah.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Definite purpose gives peace.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “When we are closed to ideas, what we hear is criticism. When we are open to criticism, what we get is advice.”
Author: Simon Sinek

Quote: “Read my story, walk through these woods, and when you get to the other side, you may not even realize that you're carrying something out that you didn't have when you went in. A little tick of an idea, clinging to your scalp or hidden in a fold of skin. Somewhere out of sight. By the time you discover it, it's already begun to prey on you; perhaps it's merely gouged your flesh, or perhaps it's already begun to nibble away at your central nervous system.”
Author: Carolyn Parkhurst

Quote: “A team is not a group of people who work together. A team is a group of people who trust each other.”
Author: Simon Sinek

Quote: “The gift of the Threads of the Spirit is to believe that in every stitch that is placed within our tapestry, it has a divine hand guiding it along. Although the paths and choices we opt to follow may be of our own design, it is with His loving hand that we are able to stitch our worries and burdens with steadfast faith. In giving it up to God and praying for His assistance, our tapestry's picture is forever forged with ethereal designs and guidance.”
Author: Judith Cosby

Quote: “Be the love, the comfort, the warmth, the hug, the light. If you aren't shining, what else are you doing?”
Author: Lady Freckles

Quote: “Your life won't start if you don't.”
Author: Azra Gregor

Quote: “Something profound happens when you wake up in a calm green pasture on the other side of the treacherous storm that you thought would end you. You discover who you are beyond the unimaginable. You discover what you are made of. Suddenly, the thing that may have broken you becomes the very thing that empowers and emboldens you.”
Author: Jodi Sky Rogers

Quote: “The necessary is a need.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Christ never reaches down to us or looks down at us. He reaches OUT to save us.”
Author: Mary Rodman

Quote: “In the event of life and death situations, the pretence of false egos fall and the decisive misunderstandings between the loved ones turn out to be trivialities and the strong opinions turn out to be masquerades which do not long last in the moment of truth.", Quote from-I Know You Now”
Author: Sushant Changotra

Quote: “Your life, your pace, your unique circumstances and everything else isn't an exact replica of another's”
Author: Fausat Omolara Ayinla

Quote: “Everyone has a choice to make. A choice to be happy and embrace the change or embrace the pain to risk your life.”
Author: Rakesh Deshpande

Quote: “Love should make you better not bitter.”
Author: Temi O'Sola

Quote: “You don't realize it at the time, but some of life's roadblocks, detours, and rejections are answered prayers.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “Frazier's got two chances. Slim, and none. And Slim just left town.”
Author: Muhammad Ali

Quote: “Forgive yourself as you strive to be your best self.”
Author: Angel Moreira

Quote: “He was a man who did everything the right way –with honor”,
Author: Lucia Omonobi

Quote: “Despite everything,I still thank the universe ,For blessing me with you ,As my first,If I could love you this much For this long,— And on my first try — ,Then surelyI could love someone else more ,Far betterFar longer.”
Author: Dawn Lanuza

Quote: “How do you ignite your passion? It takes only a spark. A forward step, an inspired word, a bold attempt, a look, a nudge—anything that sets off a flicker of excitement. When it is your passion, the smallest thing can ignite it.”
Author: Richelle E. Goodrich

Quote: “Should I be Thankful,Or Regretful ,That my only idea Of love,Is,You?”
Author: Dawn Lanuza

Quote: “External voices can damage or make you.,Don't let those voices control the wheel of your life.,Listen to your own inner voice and let it be the compass that direct your life towards greatness.”
Author: Ojingiri Hannah

Quote: “Where there are problems, it is implied that there are solutions; sometimes the solution is to endure the problem, and one problem passes and another appears. But there are some insoluble predicaments which we must transcend.”
Author: Harry A. Wilmer

Quote: “I sit quietly with a cup of coffee, and enjoy the silence. I go for a morning run, which relieves stress and is perfect for contemplation. I use the quiet time before my family awakes to write something each morning. And I read, because a good novel is one of my favorite companions.”
Author: Leo Babauta

Quote: “Don't lose Anything!”
Author: Sadiq Zakariyya

Quote: “Go where your energy is reciprocated, appreciated, & celebrated. Audit your engagements; compartmentalize & adjust accordingly.,Analyze & reflect on how each person affects you - energies you're inviting into your space/environment. Do they motivate you or keep you stagnant?”
Author: Cheyanne Ratnam

Quote: “Kindness is the key to success”
Author: Jason  Naylor

Quote: “You'd be surprised at how far you can get in life, just by being kind.”
Author: Jason  Naylor

Quote: “Trying to pump up your motivation to stick with a hard habit is like trying to force water through a bent hose. You can do it, but it requires a lot of effort and increases the tension in your life. Meanwhile, making your habits simple and easy is like removing the bend in the hose. Rather than trying to overcome the friction in your life, you reduce it.”
Author: James Clear

Quote: “We do things we don’t want to do in order to avoid doing the things we actually want to do.”
Author: Cave Man

Quote: “We need to teach people not about human beings but about being human.”
Author: Camille Burnett

Quote: “Zul je goed zorgen voor de broertjes die we waren, dan zorg ik voor de broertjes die we zijn”
Author: Ted van Lieshout

Quote: “On the road to success,while you try,be wary of eyes that pry,and fears that fly.”
Author: Temi O'Sola

Quote: “this book is not a map, but an existential guide to a vagabondish lifestyle and perspective. If you want to hold this feeling in your hands, you will have to dig for it yourself. There is no other way, no shortcut, no online course, no magic recipe.”
Author: Toby  Israel

Quote: “I learnt lessons at every step of life, ,COVID-19 pandemic was the examination & Innovation will be the new normal.”
Author: Omkar More

Quote: “There were times I thought the best of my life had passed me by. I thought I was too old and too damaged to have anything good happen. Well, the BEST parts of my life happened after that. I'm so glad I was wrong! Turns out, it's never too late to meet the people you never knew you could love so much.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “If we work together they are no match for us.”
Author: Harmony Wagner

Quote: “It’s not your fault for what I thought. Last night, it was almost like I was scaling a wall and then looked down. I could fall, I could freeze against the rock wall, or I could keep on moving up. I've dug myself out of that hole already and said 'Never Again!”
Author: Skyler Grimi

Quote: “All of us have to learn how to invent our lives, make them up, imagine them. We need to be taught these skills; we need guides to show us how. Without them, our lives get made up for us by other people.,Human beings have always joined in groups to imagine how best to live and help one another carry out the plan. The essential function of human community is to arrive at some agreement on what we need, what life ought to be, what we want our children to learn, and then to collaborate in learning and teaching so that we and they can go on the way we think is the right way.,Small communities with strong traditions are often clear about the way they want to go, and good at teaching it. But tradition may crystallize imagination to the point of fossilizing it as dogma and forbidding new ideas. Larger communities, such as cities, open up room for people to imagine alternatives, learn from people of different traditions, and invent their own ways to live.,As alternatives proliferate, however, those who take the responsibility of teaching find little social and moral consensus on what they should be teaching -- what we need, what life ought to be. In our time of huge populations exposed continuously to reproduced voices, images, and words used for commercial and political profit, there are too many people who want to and can invent us, own us, shape and control us through seductive and powerful media. It's a lot to ask of a child to find a way through all that alone.,Nobody can do anything very much, really, alone.,What a child needs, what we all need, is to find some other people who have imagined life along lines that make sense to us and allow some freedom, and listen to them. Not hear passively, but listen.”
Author: Ursula K. Le Guin

Quote: “It may feel like it now, my boy, but soon, you will see - you will see that everything you are afraid you are not.”
Author: Kristen Keenon Fisher

Quote: “We're All In This Thing Called Life, TOGETHER...Remember? Namastè & One Love.”
Author: Maxwanette A. Poetess

Quote: “Let each day of your life be an inspiration to the world and tomorrow people”
Author: Jordan Hoechlin

Quote: “People come, students and everyone else, to be inspired by the biennale. They expect to see architecture as a kind of seismograph of where we are.”
Author: Aaron Levy

Quote: “Don't fool yourself and don't let no one fool you!”
Author: Sadiq Zakariyyah

Quote: “PRAY without ceasing' and take praise breaks all throughout your day!”
Author: DeBorrah K. Ogans

Quote: “Our darkest moments are doomed to carry with them, the certainty of better days.”
Author: Jose Cossio

Quote: “We need to embrace change in order to sell change.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “If something's not giving you value, consider eliminating it from your life.”,
Author: Leo Babauta

Quote: “Behind all these manifestations is the one radiance, which shines through all things. The function of art is to reveal this radiance through the created object.”
Author: Joseph Campbell

Quote: “Your whole life has been a long road leading directly to this moment”
Author: James Redfield

Quote: “If you will hear me through a very little more, all you can ever do for me is done. I wish you to know that you have been the last dream of my soul...A dream, all a dream, that ends in nothing, and leaves the sleeper where he lay down, but I wish you to know that you inspired it.”
Author: Charles Dickens

Quote: “What is the meaning of life? To live.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “The present is all we have for action, for living. Everything else is either historical or hypothetical. Immutable data and uncertain potentialities that can be learned from and planned for, but only in the present.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “There’s only so many times a heart can break.,One day, it will be okay, but it'll heal all wrong.,It’ll heal with you outside of it.”
Author: Beena Khan

Quote: “Evil is innate, I have found. Ignored or misunderstood, it develops insidiously, on its own.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “I'm not going to get mad. I have control over my emotions. Little babies complain about video games. Men get back up and do it again and just fucking win, so that's what I'm going to do.”
Author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

Quote: “I hope to find lasting happiness and empower and inspire my fellow beings to also acquire and project their own happiness throughout the multiverse, enabling those ignorant, darkened souls to bloom and experience the blessings of true freedom.”
Author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

Quote: “Over the course of my life, many people have claimed that I am a good man. I don’t deny that claim. I am an equal helping of light and dark. Inherently, I know I am good. I also know that darkness resides inside of my heart. Thankfully, God sees through my walls and knows what resides inside. He has always protected me and others from that darkness, even when I was at my lowest.”
Author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

Quote: “It is not delusional to think we can change a world that is shrouded in darkness. A light, in and of itself, changes darkness by its very nature. If I choose to shine as a light in the darkness, I will illuminate the world around me. If I choose love over hate, I will make a difference – no matter how small that difference may be. You will, too.”
Author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

Quote: “When I look back on my life I realize I was very sick for a long time. Sitting here in good health, I find myself crying. I do that sometimes. I am very sensitive.
