My dear son Jayden, who many know as Fox0r Jr., inherited that trait from me. I see it in him already. Jaxson is confident. Owen is sweet and loving. He is also spry and cunning. Finley is bold. Finley is also a stirring and adventurous child. We have laughed together. We have cried together. We have smiled together. My sons, next to Jesus, are my greatest inspiration.”
Author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

Quote: “Without enduring faith, how can we endure life?”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Young people must respect the elderly.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Your approach could be day by day and you may concede that you will decide to ignore your own plan at times. Because you are admittedly flawed. Human after all.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Sun is rising, here comes the day. Mind is clear, thanks to you. All is good in every way, one more time—I want to.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “I count until it counts.”
Author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

Quote: “I close my eyes and inhale gently. Entranced, yet acutely aware of my role here, an indelible, wonderful part of something inestimably greater than myself.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “What if you helped your people believe things they have no business believing?”
Author: Tim Burningham

Quote: “The only myth that is going to be worth thinking about in the immediate future is one that is talking about the planet, not the city, not these people, but the planet, and everybody on it.”
Author: Joseph Campbell

Quote: “One thing that comes out in myths, for example, is at the bottom of the abyss comes the voice of salvation. The black moment is the moment when the real message of transformation is going to come. At the darkest moment comes the light.”
Author: Joseph Campbell

Quote: “Yin and yang, fundamentally different yet symbiotic. I will never see one but for the other, as day has no meaning absent the dark, nor night without light, good without bad, right without wrong.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “I even have a superstition that has grown on me as the result of invisible hands coming all the time - namely, that if you do follow your bliss you put yourself on a kind of track that has been there all the while, waiting for you, and the life that you ought to be living is the one you are living. When you can see that, you begin to meet people who are in the field of your bliss, and they open the doors to you.”
Author: joseph campbell

Quote: “Change can be difficultDon't compromise your valuesStay true.”
Author: Lochan Kalicharan

Quote: “When one tunes in into nature's frequency, life becomes change, change becomes hope!”
Author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

Quote: “I don't worry about how other people perceive me. I figure out what I want, and I work very hard to make it happen. Simple recipe. I didn't achieve any goals by having it given to me on a silver platter, through fibbing or exaggeration, nor through favours. When you work hard, the universe almost always brings people to you - synergy. The universe will reflect the energy you give it. Stop worrying about what other people think of you, or worrying about the limit(s) they have, in their heads, about your potential. The universe will bring you into your purpose organically. Nothing out of force tastes as good as what you have worked your ass off to achieve, and for which the universe synergistically opens up for you, and brings into your world. As well it is not about proving other people wrong; first and foremost prove your own negative inner voice wrong. The inner voice that internalized the negative energies of others. Sometimes we are our own biggest hurdle. And as a subsequent outcome of rewiring your inner voice, you'll leave others speechless at contesting their limitations of you...seeing the supernova you are.”
Author: Cheyanne Ratnam

Quote: “I want to be my children’s hero.”
Author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

Quote: “Any life career that you choose in following your bliss should be chosen with that sense - that nobody can frighten me off from this thing. And no matter what happens, this is the validation of my life and action.”
Author: Joseph Campbell

Quote: “Protect your time - it's your most valuable commodity. Guard it with your life.”
Author: Leo Babauta

Quote: “There is a third form of possession or madness, of which the Muses are the source. This seizes a tender, virgin soul and stimulates it to rapt passionate expression, especially in lyric poetry, glorifying the countless mighty deeds of ancient times for the instruction of posterity. But if any man comes to the gates of poetry without the madness of the Muses, persuaded that skill alone will make him a good poet, then shall he and his works of sanity with him be brought to nought by the poetry of madness, and behold, their place is nowhere to be found.”,
Author: Plato

Quote: “Fact is people are watching from a distance. They might not say but they are watching, some are inspired, some are straight up jealous, some are proud and honestly happy for you! Just continue doing what makes you who you truly are.”
Author: Sista Ginna

Quote: “Explaining true love is like conveying the sight of a sunrise to someone who’s always slept in.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “The fates pay deference to the power of our love. Our disparate paths converge. I feel it.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “A sorrow I feel, for beauty in distress. Delicate, bent and weeping. Assailed by hurt.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “I find it all too easy to overlook the good things. I suppose this is common, but I don't wish to be common.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “I’m grateful for the little things you do for me. Not to show me you love me, rather, because you love me.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “A goal without a plan is a dream. A goal without a backup plan is a wager.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “If you believe you have found yourself, keep searching. You are deeper than you think.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “In order to achieve sustained spiritual growth and serenity, you must first accept that it is your thoughts that make you who you are.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Reflect on your thoughts, understand and learn from who you were yesterday. Then add that knowledge to who you are today. In this manner, you will be a more knowledgeable and spiritual person tomorrow. Then do it again tomorrow. And the next day…”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “I harbor an unbridled ardor of life, an impassioned love for living. Not for being, for existence. Rather, a zeal for the Earth's entire spectrum of possibilities and experiences to choose from and to do.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Salvation is an absolute grace of a Sovereign God.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “The future is as much an unknown masterpiece as your mind, imagination, and conduct can fashion.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Things we have done and said and experienced, or things that have been said and done to us, those are recorded. Facsimiles of a bygone present. It’s data, more or less. What we do with that data, with that information, has impact on how we feel and what we choose to do in the now.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Choosing to do nothing, or even the next best thing, because of apprehension or fear is a coward's failure. A craven dereliction.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Step Up & Inspire Everyone.,The ones who said you cannot.,The ones who made you fall.,The ones who looked up with hope.,The ones who believed in you.”
Author: Bernard D'sa

Quote: “That’s the irony, the truly moral man is the one called most immoral. And the real scoundrel -who has no code- who only gives a fuck about popularity and money and staying out of trouble, blending in with the herd, that man is held up as some paragon of virtue(...)”
Author: Roman McClay Sanction

Quote: “That’s the irony, the truly moral man is the one called most immoral. And the real scoundrel -who has no code- who only gives a fuck about popularity and money and staying out of trouble, blending in with the herd, that man is held up as some paragon of virtue(...)”
Author: Roman McClay

Quote: “Consider that what is seen, heard and felt is oftentimes a spurious variation of reality. It is in understanding each unique history of thought that leads up to those sights, those sounds and sentiments, that truth is revealed.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Though they are essential, emotions affect judgement when left unchecked. This then leads to invalid assumptions and flawed perceptions. Facts are misconstrued, correlation is confused with causation and reality begins to depart a path of truth.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Once an honest and complete self-analysis and understanding of thought is realized, the mind is freed to interpret the world more accurately.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Thinly veiled is the language of the powerful.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “A fool chooses nothing or all and ends up completely alone. The safe path is a coward's pall, only a weak man could condone”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Even though it hurts me so, this broken heart is tough. For now, forgive, forget and for us, that is enough.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Sometimes, there is no why.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Portentous, uncertain, intoxicating. A leap of faith. It asked me if I wanted it, and of course, I said yes.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Pursue in lieu of a full mind, mindfulness. Absent this, the value of all, of everything, or nearly so is nearly nothing.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “The line between need and want, whether fine or wide, can be poorly interpreted depending on the circumstances.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Evil is innate, I have found. Ignored or misunderstoodit develops insidiously, on its own.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “I’ll try even when the odds are overwhelmingly against me. ,Only this time, strings will be pulled, bridges will be burned, and the worst of pandora’s box will see light of day.”
Author: Louise Philippe Dulay

Quote: “True happiness is being happy without a reason.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “A dream is not simply an idea to entertain a life gone bored. Rather, it is a reality waiting to ignite a world gone dark.”
Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

Quote: “Every life led to a series of quiet epiphanies - or at least to opportunities for epiphanies - and Chyna was washed by a poignant new grief when she thought about this grim aspect of the Templeton family's interrupted journeys. The kindnesses they might have done for others. The love they might have given. The things they might have come to understand in their hearts.”,
Author: Dean Koontz

Quote: “The parameters are the things you bounce off of to create art.”
Author: Neil Gaiman

Quote: “If the pushing-yourself-forward is the engine, then the patting-yourself-on-the-back should be the oil to keep going.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Love leads the way to light.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Envy is an error.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Sales is like courting, you just need more than a cocktail.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “If it is to be, it's up to YOU!”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Easily gained is easily lost.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “In order to expect change, we must first change ourselves.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Only survival and ambition makes one confront their own fears.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Practicing what you preach is a lot more difficult than preaching what you practice.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Talk about trouble and live troubled, talk about dreams and live passionately.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “When spirit of Christ calls, heed to the heavenly voice.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Your life is empty, if you got nothing to die for.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Living in the past makes your future predictable.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Challenge your sales force, but above all, set your sales people up to succeed, not to fail.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Only survival and true ambition makes one confront their own fears.” ”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “You can't really lose a game you are not supposed to play.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “If you cant sell it to yourself, you cant sell it to someone else.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “If you don't like the game, change the rules.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Like I said in previous videos, if I don't come forward exposing this stuff, then I'm no different than a bully; if I don't stand by the words I've written or said, then I'd be a hypocrite!”
Author: Matthew Kenslow

Quote: “If you endured the pain, you will be purified.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Rocket-fueled rapt ambition; fate concedes to my volition. There is nothing I can't take wherever there's a win at stake.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Wouldn’t it be perfect if I could fit in and never worry about what others were thinking? To be free of these vacant, immutable fantasies and released from this ceaseless want of emotional refuge? To be normal. Would that I were.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Afraid of nightfall closing in; the lambent god lifts my run. Flying now on Icarus wings, cannot help but chase the Sun.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Reach down deep and draw a line. Continue thinking, walking tall. The problem's theirs, never mine. The insanity of it all.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “I'm grasping for some sense of alacrity and the compulsion to perform in a broad way, before life's random curtain call retires me from this tired satire, this comically absurd play.”
Author: John     Casey

Quote: “Love can be a natural endowment, a present, or a gift. If it is not just a donation, it can be a divine talent. Since love is a silver bullet, it can make the unimaginable possible through the power of its inspiration. ("Love as dizzy as a cathedral")”
Author: Erik Pevernagie

Quote: “I hadn't ever thought that a man could love me in the same way that my friends love me; that I could love a man with the same commitment and care with which I love them. Maybe all this time I had been in a great marriage without even realising.”,
Author: Dolly Alderton

Quote: “If you try to be everything to everyone, you become nothing”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Share your mistakes with the world because you once wished that someone would have done the same.”
Author: Amara Leggett

Quote: “Don't work to hard on appearing to be right, but on being right”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Remembering the why will inspire the how”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “And I wondered, who is it that’s aware that I’m thinking? And suddenly I was thrown into this amazing feeling of freedom. I was no longer a fragment of the universe, I was the universe.”,~Jim Carrey”
Author: Jim Carrey

Quote: “As much as possible, allow yourself to be a raw nerve end that internalizes whatever is experienced in life.”
Author: Jeff VanderMeer

Quote: “Whoever listens to correction , obey the commands to repent of every evil done.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “The sun shines powerfully and the flowers express themselves beautifully regardless of your opinion, gratitude, or indifference. They live out their purpose... UNAPOLOGETICALLY. I love that!”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “If we do not wish to perish, we must pray.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “I'm not a machine. I'm a person navigating this incredible life. There are days I wake up and seize every fresh new opportunity, days I walk through as a "same crap-different day" zombie, days I feel incredibly proud for navigating it right, and days I have so much fun getting it wrong.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “A man act as he thinks.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Vulnerability is a type of comfort.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “This day offers a full range of amazing experiences and blessings. You may laugh, you may cry, you may get tired, you may get wet, you may fall in love, you may get dirty... adventure is like that. Treat today like an adventure... EXPLORE... don't walk around it.... JUMP IN!”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “My heart desire is for souls to be saved through God's grace.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Where we are today was an impossibility yesterday, what we see as impossible today is a possibility tomorrow. There is no such thing as an impossible dream.I’m here to inspire young people to believe in Possibilities.”
Author: Edem Agbana

Quote: “It is a bit of a dream. And so we'll dream it. With a little courage, we can dream it for the rest of our lives.”
Author: Roxanne Veletzos

Quote: “Do something everyday towards the fulfillment of your dreams.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Then the vision of an enormous town presented itself, of a monstrous town more populous than some continents and in its man-mad might as if indifferent to heaven's frowns and smiles; a cruel devourer of the world's light. There was room enough there to place any story, depth enough there for any passion, variety enough there for any setting, darkness enough there to bury five millions of lives.”
Author: Joseph Conrad

Quote: “Then the vision of an enormous town presented itself, of a monstrous town more populous than some continents and in its man-made might as if indifferent to heaven's frowns and smiles; a cruel devourer of the world's light. There was room enough there to place any story, depth enough there for any passion, variety enough there for any setting, darkness enough there to bury five millions of lives.”
Author: Joseph Conrad

Quote: “Perfection is God’s territory. Our human territory is a practice field. And it’s filled with mistakes and accidents and false starts and defeats. And every now and again, a victory. This is how we become equipped, not for perfection, but for life.”
Author: Sean Coons

Quote: “I am feeling demotivated today! But that itself is a motivation to do some work that keeps me motivated to expect the good results. Results that will be good enough to motivate me for tomorrow.”
Author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

Quote: “God delights to hear people pray.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Difficulties are necessary to know the Divine Being.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Love leads the way to the Lord of life.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Sorrow is never shared.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Uncovering the right problem is half the solution.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “You never jump far when you are standing still.”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “Sales people produce their own fruits. They should own them, whether they taste great or horrible!”
Author: Yuri van der Sluis

Quote: “ONE OF THE BEST GIFT THAT WE CAN GIVE TO OUR SELF IS OUR HIGHEST INFLUENCE AND COURAGE.”
Author: Dax Bamania

Quote: “Accepting your truth is a gateway to walk in your light.”
Author: Angel Moreira

Quote: “Whatever we focus our attention on grows. When we attend to what energizes or inspires us, we flourish.”
Author: David Taylor-Klaus

Quote: “We create our future self by default or design.”
Author: Nicole Cody

Quote: “The thing about poets,is we need heartache,and madness and loss,like the air we breathe - ,for without the chaoswords are just tiny,letters without a soul.”,
Author: grace gegenheimer

Quote: “It takes so much courage just to start”
Author: Michael Roach

Quote: “What is the job of a parent, but to teach a child she has worth so that one day she can transform herself into whatever she wants.”
Author: Stacey  Lee

Quote: “In the end, maybe what you really seek is not so much balance but a calming of the storm in your soul.”
Author: Gail Armatys

Quote: “If we do something just to help ourselves, it will never work. You can never really put effort into a thing if it's only for yourself. It has to be for something bigger.”
Author: Michael Roach

Quote: “If the girl you're interested in doesn't inspire you to greater effort than you would undertake without knowing her, then you'd better look around and get another.”
Author: George Romney

Quote: “My passion in life is to teach and educate. If I make money along the way, then that is a wonderful thing too. The important thing is that you are given more opportunities by me sharing my knowledge and experience.”
Author: Linda Rawson

Quote: “My eyes opened... I had been blessed with a new day; another chance to get it right. I could take a small step in a healthier direction. I could allow the grace I have been shown to fuel my courage to let go of the past. I could be grateful to see that God thinks I deserve another day... And I will make this day count!”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “...But sometimes the best things to happen to us are the ones we didn't know we needed”
Author: Sheridan Anne

Quote: “Jesus Christ is our righteousness., Jesus Christ is our holiness., Jesus Christ is our redemption.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “My father often said, when people called you monkey, make sure you stick your tail out, and make it long enough.”
Author: Nurudeen Ushawu

Quote: “A blessing loves a good surprise.”
Author: Stacey  Lee

Quote: “Seek the hidden treasure in every trouble.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Think of how many chances and fresh starts you have given others... Let today be the day you grant that to yourself. A new day. A fresh start. Renewed energy. Endless opportunities and blessings. Let's make today worth remembering!”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “Trust me, once your heart learns something, it will work and everything will be better for your own goods.”
Author: Shaa Zainol

Quote: “I had no control over what the Iraq War would ask of me; the only thing I could decide was how I would show up in it. What I would do. What I wouldn't do. In that decision I found what was worth dying for and what was worth living for- love.”
Author: Diana Oestreich

Quote: “Violence isn't only bombs and bullets, it can be speaking words that dehumanize and looking away when someone needs you to lean in and stand up alongside them to confront the racism, the intimidation, or the belittling.”
Author: Diana Oestreich

Quote: “Today is a great day to reconnect with who you are. Not the You that everyone else convinced you to be... but the real YOU. Stop playing small for other people's comfort. Reconnect with the power you have to overcome adversity and to shape your life. It's a new day... and ti's time for your BADDASSS self to rise and shine!”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “My perspective is different now. I'm stronger than ever. I may have let you control my story for awhile, but those days are over. NEVER AGAIN! My history will not interfere with my destiny. I'm in control of this journey now... Buckle up!”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “You are a collection of your own thoughts. What thoughts you generate these are accumulated and formed your own destiny.,If you richly think, you become rich, if you poorly think, you become poor. Therefore, your thought is the master of your own life.”
Author: Lord Robin

Quote: “I believe in a better world.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “Yes good one- hold on tight- to ideas. At times, since we are talking so much about birds and all things avian, these flighty things do have a tendency to spread their gossamer wings and take flight. So you haven’t even begun to see it and it disappears from your view. At times you don’t even know how many of these frisky things you thought of and they instantly frolicked their way into some wonderland. There they remain latent. Sometimes for mere moments, sometimes days, sometimes months and years. And then in a flash. They come back without warning, at times stealthily, in our most unguarded moments- in bed, polishing shoes, rolling out a roti, driving or pooping and you are not prepared. They settle tentatively on your sleepy eyes for a second and before you know it, fly past you in a flash again, good for you if you hold them then and there, for if you think you will sit yourself down one day with the wrong end of the pen in your mouth, or the laptop loaded with the works, or the dream paints on the palette, to capture what you saw in your mind’s stratosphere- you just blink and find it’s just a blankness you see, no matter how hard you try, a blankness that stares with a baffling obduracy. At times you even forget that you forgot. The thought had yet not entered your conscious mind- it was just hovering between the sleeping world and the awake, and just falls off the edge. Never makes it. Yes they are flighty things.” She rounded it with a peal of laughter, amused with the little story she had concocted.”
Author: Sakoon Singh

Quote: “Fill your soul with beauty...,art,contemplation of your Creation,the power of LOVE,friends,family,people you don't know,God”
Author: Sean Coons

Quote: “When I cast my mind back and compare it with the treadmill stress that my life is now, I think ah, those were the days. I didn't know I was born. Sometimes it's not being at the top that's the truly joyous part of success, it's getting there.”
Author: Claudia Carroll

Quote: “Everyone deals with crap in life. You're not supposed to sit around and let the crap deal with you because you deal with the crap.”
Author: Charleen Pan

Quote: “Refuse to succumb to the ultimate aim of the Propaganda Age, which is to flood you with ever-changing distractions and thereby fool you into thinking there is no such thing as truth.”
Author: Sean Coons

Quote: “We are all stitches in a fabric too vast to comprehend. But perhaps that is a good thing, for it means we are always exactly where we need to be.”,
Author: Roshani Chokshi

Quote: “Sometimes we just need to look at something beautiful to refresh our souls. Shout-out to the places and people who enliven our spirits. Thank you.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “Whatever it is you want to be good at, you have to make sure you continue to read, and learn, and seek joy elsewhere, because you never know where inspiration will strike.”
Author: Sid Meier

Quote: “Love is not a joke. What is a joke are the people who treat it that way.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “Golden framed and heavy, the painting.,Ocean waves curled in suspended timewhite-lipped and silent beneath brush-stroked blues,of sky. Gulls are captured there, mid-flight, fishing moments stolen in time, they soar without moving.”
Author: Christina M. Ward

Quote: “I made your favorite." Nannie says, her elegant hand tremblesso subtle it hides behind a smile. She listens,carefullyresponds quickly, eases the baked macaroni from the oven.,We wash our hands with bars of smooth soap in delicate shapes.,We are quiet, careful not to touch the glass of doors.,We do not leave fingerprints here.”
Author: Christina M. Ward

Quote: “Don't become so busy getting yours that your heavenly treasures dwindle.”
Author: VaeEshia Ratcliff-Davis

Quote: “I speak out because I know the pain of staying silent.”
Author: Cleo Wade

Quote: “Sometimes all it takes to awaken a dream is meeting someone who is living the dream.”
Author: Omony Geoffrey Ocaya

Quote: “Hope, Kabir. Hope gives you the courage to move on.”
Author: Beena Khan

Quote: “No man is a failure, for only he must not quit.”
Author: Davinder Pahra

Quote: “Inspiration can be fleeting. Self-motivation is everlasting if it is sincere.”
Author: Rob Steger

Quote: “If you cannot be an inspiration, make sure you are not a hindrance.”
Author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

Quote: “Motivation is the blanket of your spirit. It gives you warm, sheath and safety for your vision, positivity and energy to protect them from lower, negative, toxic and detrimental vibes. It keeps them alive! Always bathe it.”
Author: Lord Robin

Quote: “[When asked where his drive comes from] " You're bullied, you're miserable...every artist has someone who told them they weren't worth dirt and someone who told them that they were the second coming of the baby Jesus and they believed them both, and that's the fuel that stirs the fire.”
Author: Bruce Springsteen

Quote: “I see life as a roadside inn where I have to stay until the coach from the abyss pulls up. I don't know where it will take me, because I don't know anything. I could see this inn as a prison, for I'm compelled to wait in it; I could see it as a social centre, for it's here that I meet others.”
Author: Fernando Pessoa

Quote: “Your life is like a movie and you’re the main character, so make it the greatest movie you’ve ever seen.”
Author: Motlase Morwane

Quote: “If you understand what the phrase, "I'd rather be a hammer than a nail" means, and concur, then you are one out of a multitude and I congratulate you in the fullest sense of the sentiment.”
Author: Charles Van-Heyden

Quote: “Life seems vast when you live every momentTherefore without any pause enjoy every second”
Author: Benisha Perumal Nadar

Quote: “Spread the light.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “I love that we get a new day... A new opportunity to move our lives in a positive direction... Let's be unencumbered by yesterday's nonsense... a fresh start... Take a deep breath, smile, and start again.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “What can one do about one's skin? We, who are clay blended by the Master Potter, come from the kiln of Creation in many hues. How can people say one skin is colored, when each has its own coloration?,What should it matter that one bowl is dark and the other pale, if each is of good design and serves its purpose well.”
Author: Polingaysi Qoyawayma (Elizabeth Q. White)

Quote: “The worst of it is, that as a revolutionary she is out of fashion. Before, she was an inspiration. But inspiration is not wanted now, it seems. One must be practical, one must be administrative, one must understand economics and systems. She pines. She said to me, that very evening, 'Our Moses was luckier than he knew, to die before he went into the promised land.”
Author: Sylvia Townsend Warner

Quote: “Sometimes we need to go back to the grief, to that moment, and really dig into what happened, how we suffered, how we broke, before we can start putting the pieces back together and move forward.”
Author: Anne Fricke

Quote: “Our families need our experience, but society needs expertise”
Author: Vijay Sridhara

Quote: “There’s a great deal of life in a dance, one must know, ,full of twirling anticipation and gliding wonder.,It has the power to bring strangers together, ,To open one’s soul to the possibilities of love. ,It reminds us of the unspoken truth—that we are all children, ,In need of a wild song and bit of careless freedom.”
Author: Erin Forbes

Quote: “By looking back in time, one can learn how to act, and at the same time, how not to. Thus a case for History can be made.”
Author: Likhith Naidu Tati

Quote: “You give me a pen, and I will conquer the world.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “What is the world for if not to evoke and reflect back to us, as mirror, the obfuscated aspects of ourselves?”
Author: Bernardo Kastrup

Quote: “You are enough”
Author: Bobby Temps

Quote: “Let us 'inspire' intently and breathe 'consciously' and instill the 'inspiration' that guides us to create a fearless future. We can then 'expire' infinitely and emanate insight and thought, and deliver tools for the others on the sideline. ("'My radio ")”,
Author: Erik Pevernagie

Quote: “Knowledge of the sort you need does not begin with information, it begins with experience and perception. But there is a dark and twisty road from experience and perception to correct action.”
Author: Laurence Gonzales

Quote: “Magical Monday is an amalgamation of passion, perseverance and performance.”
Author: Subhashree Jena

Quote: “One of the best things you can do for yourself is to love yourself.”
Author: Angel Moreira

Quote: “Seperti hal nya Jogja.,Semakin hari, semakin membuat jatuh cinta.”
Author: Niknik Gantini

Quote: “you can find inspiration in anything if you look at it in the right way, marks and stretch in the walls can be used to discover a new texture, or you can experiment with stones and everyday objects.,it just a matter of finding something that intrigues you visually and figuring out how you can explore these everyday findings and incorporate them into your way of working”
Author: Jonny Wan

Quote: “Be inspired to live your dream”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Shout-out to everyone who won't be going back to "normal"! Those who will refuse to allow the nonsense they used it. Those who will set new healthy standards. Those who will let go, forgive, and move on. Those who will finally act upon their goals and dreams. Those who will never again shrink themselves for those who refuse to grow. Those who will fall back in love with life. Those who will come out of this chaos stronger and more baddasss than ever!”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: “Happiness is not a feeling, happiness is not an emotion, happiness is a decision that each of us make every single day when we wake up.”
Author: Chad E.  Foster

Quote: “If you’re not getting outside of your comfort zone, then you’re not growing”
Author: Chad E.  Foster

Quote: “History is wonder of the greatest sort.”
Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

Quote: “Follow the road to the end of the water. Sit down and watch the clouds appear.”
Author: Anonymous

Quote: “While some qualities are born within a person, others need to be made.”
Author: Anas O Hamshari B Sc

Quote: “Aku tidak pernah betul-betul pulang kerumah.,Aku hanyalah petualang tersesat.”
Author: Niknik Gantini

Quote: “Setiap hari hadir retakan baru.,Dan aku membiarkannya seolah itu adalah caraku bertahan.”
Author: Niknik Gantini

Quote: “Throughout history, the life of a businessperson always involves some risk; the higher the risk, the greater the reward. On the other hand, the life of an employee in any workforce involves minimal to no risk at all, resulting in a lifetime full of steadiness with little to no accomplishments during this lifetime. However, there is a crucial factor which can also be considered as a trait or characteristic that made many remarkable men and women throughout history reach high levels of their career paths, which is considered to be “success” in our modern,world: Audacity.”
Author: Anas O Hamshari B Sc

Quote: “Ceritakan kisahmu hari ini, jadikan aku pendengar setiamu.,Menepilah saat kau lelah, aku hanya ingin menjadi rumah segala keluh kesahmu.,Ironis memang, tapi hanya itu yang aku bisa.”
Author: Niknik Gantini

Quote: “Karena Tuhan Maha romantis atas segala sesuatu sehingga selalu memberi kejutan indah bagi hamba-hamba nya yang ikhlas.”
Author: Niknik Gantini

Quote: “Tak ada yang istimewa.,Tak ada yang paling istimewa.,Tak ada yang perlu diistimewakan.,Semua istimewa dengan caranya sendiri, kupikir.”
Author: Niknik Gantini

Quote: “Katsuya Jōnouchi [to Esper Roba]: I have friends in this town...and you have your brothers! As long as you're not alone...you're always strong!”
Author: Kazuki Takahashi

Quote: “Hope dies all the time. And yet we need to believe it will come back and attach itself to a new cause - a new love, a new house, something that gives us a sense of purpose, which is ultimately what hope is.”
Author: Hilton Als

Quote: “Die Schildkröte kämpft nie gegen die Wellen an, sondern nutzte sie für sich.”
Author: John Strelecky

Quote: “Anzu: I don't know where I should go either...everybody's like that! We're all scared, but we have to keep moving forward, even if we can't see the road in front of us...holding our heads up high...believing in what lies ahead...even while we sit here, that moment is coming closer every second...We've all got limited time...you know?...I know it's not easy to chase your dreams...But I want to believe that I have a chance. Even if it's just a tiny one...”
Author: Kazuki Takahashi

Quote: “Be good. Be great. Come out swinging”
Author: Emilia Finn

Quote: “I don’t care to be perfect at anything in particular. ,Art is not perfection but feeling—emotion stripped down to the core. ,No, I don’t want to be perfect, but I want to be good, ,To wrap myself in truth and beauty, and share it,With those who care to listen.,I want someone to look at my writing and say, “that’s her,”,Familiar with my flights of fancy, ,Acquainted with my air of artistry. ,And if each word fades out in timeKnown only to the depths of a few sweet souls. ,I shall value that prose all the more. ,To speak the unspokenTo commune with kindred spirits. ,That is the purpose for which my words are born.”
Author: Erin Forbes

Quote: “There is no hurdle too high for you to jump over.”
Author: Michael H. Forde

Quote: “Your definition of success, your “why”, is something that comes from deep within.”
Author: Michael H. Forde

Quote: “The very same people who kick you when you are down will worship your triumphant version.”
Author: Michael H. Forde

Quote: “Be resilient, be outspoken; be a spokesperson for your success.”
Author: Michael H. Forde

Quote: “Never be complacent with anything less than greatness.”
Author: Michael H. Forde

Quote: “How can you learn to heal if the past is a place you want to stay in?”
Author: Beena Khan

Quote: “Amid all the harsh words of a cruel world, let my voice speak out in tenderness. There is an inner light which must be nourished and cannot be replaced with a blind eye. Soft spirits are so much more than the simple result of hopeless romanticism. Each one is the soul of beauty and love combined.”
Author: Erin Forbes

Quote: “He brought up her old scars again, and now he couldn’t leave them on the shelf like books to gather dust.”,
Author: Beena Khan

Quote: “You have the inspiration of a jester, the soul of a backpacker and the heart of a warrior, and you’ve already done much better than you appreciate. You’re supported more than you realise. You’re in spitting distance now, just around the corner ,Each and every one of you is a work of art. Not everyone’s going to accept you, but the ones who do will never forget you. Come on, admit it, you’re not like the others, are you? And that’s not just okay, it’s fucking beautiful!,Always remember, when you’re stuck between two planets, the only thing you can do is try something absurd.,….. And you may just hear a river start.”
Author: Karl Wiggins

Quote: “Muslims should always be ready to struggle for what they believe in, for faith is not a matter of words but of deeds.”
Author: Tahia Al-Ismail

Quote: “Embrace obstacles, they are always opportunities in disguise.”
Author: B.J. Forte

Quote: “Powerful people come in all packages. Sometimes unpredictable and unsuspecting packages. Each with their own priorities, dreams, challenges, gifts to give, and journey.”
Author: Julieanne O'Connor

Quote: “When you love someone, you love someone.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “Dreams were meant to be born, not just dreamt about.”
Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

Quote: “Don't be a fool...,Never believe in people who say,"money isn't everything", they say because their parents are Rich., Start hustling today ,that only can make you financially stable ,Its easy to say "money isn't everything" when You have 10 lacks in Your bank account .,you can't afford food, clothes or anything without money... everything needs MONEY.”
Author: Vishnu Aravind

Quote: “I have everything I need to get everything I want.”
Author: Rob Liano

Quote: “Motivation is what happens when you take hold of an idea. Inspiration is what happens when an idea takes hold of you.”
Author: Wayne Dyer

Quote: “A changed soul, a forgiven heart, a journey of transformation.”
Author: Chimnese Davids

Quote: “If you don't try you won't get!”
Author: Michael Koest

Quote: “Live your energy.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “The depth of life can’t be measured with successes and failures, and they don’t define life, rather life can be a trial and error as we commit mistakes and learn to do it right. Life can also be a series of mistakes and regrets at the end. We do have a choice and we subsequently end up being the victim of the consequences of our choices.”
Author: Prasanna Vignesh

Quote: “Step into your own energy.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “The losses that we had came into our lives so we can find each other and help heal each other... you were the only goodness left in my life.”
Author: Beena Khan

Quote: “Poetry stirs the soul and speaks to the mind to understand the beauty we call life ~ Mala Naidoo”
Author: Mala Naidoo

Quote: “I'm a kind woman. I am not a mean girl and never will be.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “Even though no one else can give you what you missed as a child, this doesn't mean you are doomed to never receive it. There is one person who can give you what you missed on- what you so desperately need and desire. That person is you.”
Author: Beverly Engel

Quote: “Dark Bakura: The odds are a bit against you. But that doesn't mean you've lost yet...”
Author: Kazuki Takahashi

Quote: “Serve many be greatLove each other design our fate”
Author: BJ Klock

Quote: “Always be courageous and not nervous.,Raise your hand, stand up, wipe the sweat off your brow.,Be steady, stop your knees from shaking.,Speak up with a clear voice of confidence others want to hear from you!”
Author: Joseph S. Spence Sr.

Quote: “Expression of your internal joy is the gift of inspiration for everyone.”
Author: Purvi Raniga

Quote: “You are wrong if you think Joy emanates only or principally from human relationships. God has placed it all around us. It is in everything and anything we might experience. We just have to have the courage to turn against our habitual lifestyle and engage in unconventional living.”
Author: Chris McCandless

Quote: “Today let them call you CrazyTomorrow they will call you for Advice.”
Author: Amit Shah

Quote: “The best way to create is to create from your heart—create what moves you. Teach the class you’ve always wanted to take, cook the meal you’ve always wanted to try, write the book you’ve always wanted to read. Do it your way. Do it the way that makes your heart sing.”

Quote: “Delete the thoughts from your mind, which do nothing good to you!”
Author: Gunjan Bugde

Quote: “Forget the past, dwell on today and focus on the future.”

Quote: “Not all heroes come swooping in to rescue a damsel in distress. I think the greatest heroes are the ones that inspire us, the ones that help us recognize the hero within ourselves.”,
Author: Jacqueline Simon Gunn

Quote: “We do indeed weave our spirit to the events and relationships of our lives. Life is as simple as that.”
Author: Caroline Myss

Quote: “I wonder if you don't have somebody in your life that just the very thought of that person makes you feel better. It would be wonderful if you could take a minute, at least a minute every day, to think of such a person. Just think. Just be quiet and think. It would make all the difference in the world.”
Author: Amy Hollingsworth

Quote: “See everything right in life and it will be right. See everything wrong in life and it will be wrong. ”
Author: Meir Ezra

Quote: “Sky is not the limit”
Author: William Carbone

Quote: “Love is always possible.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “Be the star that you are.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “Follow your heart and follow your happiness.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “One of the greatest gifts in life is travel.”
Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “You got to give it all you can possible do.”

Quote: “Springtime is soul of awakeness.”

Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “Be faithful, follow the light and you will lead a wonderful joyous life. Who wouldn't want that?”

Quote: “Today is a great day to remember who YOU are.”

Quote: “We are here to dance to the music of our souls, to live in the wonder of our presence, and to be who we are in the beauty of our divine being.”

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

Quote: “One of the best things you can do for yourself is to be kind to yourself.”

Quote: “Take your garbage somewhere else 'cause I'm not buying it.”

Quote: “We are here to live life in love, peace, and happiness.”

Author: Roman McClay

Author: Delma Pryce

Quote: “Your success is limited to how big or small you think...Think Global to go Global.”

Quote: “I feel alive in ghost mode.”

Quote: “The stars are there to guide us to our dreams, but we must make an effort to follow.”

Quote: “Laughter lightens the soul.”

Author: Adrienne Posey

Quote: “Trust within.”

Quote: “Have a firmer grasp or grip on your dream. Then you can anchor yourself in that, and you won't be swayed one way or another.”
Author: Adrienne Posey
